Multimedia at the IMF Center

Mini-theater  -  Photos

Mini-theater

Currently showing in DVD format:

Millennium: The IMF in the New Century (see IMF Videos)
Learn how the IMF is evolving as a global institution to meet the challenge of promoting macroeconomic stability, economic growth and poverty reduction.

Photos



Students from Thomson Elementary School, Washington DC participate in pilot lesson plan for elementary students at the IMF Center. June 14, 2001.




Students from the White Oaks School. May 11, 2001.
